body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
$ spack install py-pytest ^python@2.7.14 %gcc@7.3.0
```

### Platform and user environment
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux xrmlite.phys.northwestern.edu 3.10.0-693.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Aug 22 21:09:27 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.5.1804 (Core)
``` 
### Additional information
```
[sajid@xrmlite ~]$ spack spec --install-status py-pytest ^python@2.7.14 %gcc@7.3.0
```

```
    @hookspec(historic=True, warn_on_impl=PYTEST_NAMESPACE)
```

title: Installation issue : faulty install py-pytest
